name: .XMWX File Extension
summary: Learn about .XMWX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In most cases, you should not need to open an XMWX file. However, if you were unexpectedly forced to quit an ExamSoft exam, you may be able to resume the exam by opening your XMWX file in ExamSoft SofTest (Windows, Mac). To do so, open SofTest and select your XMWX file from the Exam File dropdown list.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
